pirates_msg1.message:
There are pirates on the island.
Help load them onto ships.

pirates_msg2p.message:
This ship can hold more pirates.
Drag the pirates to the ship.

pirates_msg2s.message:
This ship can hold 1 more pirate.
Drag him to the ship.

pirates_msg3.message: Good Job! We'll be back for more.

pirates_msg4.message: Good Job! All pirates are rescued.

rockets_msg1.message:
5 rockets need fuel to launch.
Add the right amount to each.

bowling_msg1.message:
Get ready to bowl!
1. Wait for the ball to line up just right
2. Click "ROLL THE BALL"

bowling_msg2.message:
Well done!
You scored

on your first throw.
Click "ROLL THE BALL" again
for your second throw.

bowling_correctp.message:
Great job!
You chose the right answer!
You have more games to go.

bowling_corrects.message:
Great job!
You chose the right answer!
You have 1 more game to go.

bowling_correctz.message:
Great job!
You chose the right answer!
You're done, continue to see your score.
